creator: Avatars Makers Factory
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to our game! It's time to dive into the pastel world and create yourself the cutest avatar! ✨

Pastel Girl and her Pet is a free dress up game that gives you the opportunity to dress a girl up, do her makeup and choose her a kawaii pet. Just unleash your inner fashionista: start dressing up anime dolls exactly the way you want!
Already decided how you want to dress up your heroine? A schoolgirl in sneakers, with a kitten? A forest princess with her fox? A fantasy maiden with a griffin? Or maybe a neko athlete walking her pony? It's all open to your creativity! We love Japanese culture, and especially anime, so you can find loads of famous cosplay outfits.
Every girl loves dress up games and makeup. So we hope you enjoy our trendy outfits and amazing manga graphics!

💎 Imagine you're in a fashion salon with beautiful dresses and accessories. There are millions of possible combinations for different looks, allowing for endless fun! 💎

Features of our game:
👝 No in-app purchases, everything is absolutely free! (You can't spend real money here)
🍥 Works without the internet (or Wi-Fi)
💇 Awesome hairstyling system with bangs and back of hair
👗 An extensive collection of outfits, hats, shoes, stockings, accessories and much more!
😺 The ability to create a unique pet
💟 Ready-made backgrounds and the ability to choose your own

Download the app and start your incredible adventure right now! 🐣
Save the finished picture anytime, anywhere as an avatar or sticker, or share it with your friends on social media 👫 (And you can also use the image as an illustration for your fan fiction)
And if you find anything missing, just leave a review and we will try to add it 💜
